name: Dhaka Tech Fest 2025
description: Explore the latest innovations in AI, robotics, and software development at Bangladesh's biggest tech event.

name: Old Dhaka Street Food Carnival
description: Taste authentic Old Dhaka delicacies with live music and cultural performances at the heart of the city.

name: Watercolor Art Workshop
description: A beginner-friendly art session teaching watercolor techniques by renowned local artists.

name: Green Living Eco Fair
description: An event promoting sustainable living with eco-friendly product booths, workshops, and panel talks.

name: Heritage Site Photo Walk
description: Join fellow photography lovers in capturing the timeless beauty of Panam City's historical ruins.

name: Night Street Food Fiesta
description: Enjoy late-night street snacks from across Bangladesh with live DJs and a lakeside vibe.
